verses.roman:
ahaṁ bandhyāsapatnī ca
snuṣā me yujyate katham
janayiṣyasi yaṁ rājñi
tasyeyam upayujyate

synonyms: aham—I am; bandhyā—sterile; asa-patnī—I have no co-wife; ca—also; snuṣā—daughter-in-law; me—my; yujyate—could be; katham—how; janayiṣyasi—you will give birth to; yam—which son; rājñi—O my dear Queen; tasya—for him; iyam—this girl; upayujyate—will be very suitable.
translation: Śaibyā said, "I am sterile and have no co-wife. How can this girl be my daughter-in-law? Please tell me." Jyāmagha replied, "My dear Queen, I shall see that you indeed have a son and that this girl will be your daughter-in-law."
